title: Negative externality, more than optimal output

content.question: An industry will produce more than the socially efficient level of output under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: The production or consumption of a good generates a positive externality.
The production or consumption of a good generates a negative externality.
The industry produces a public good.
The industry produces a private good.

content.answer: The production or consumption of a good generates a negative externality.
